reviews.text: I used this train station for 4 years.It is very basic no parking and no ticket station When you leave you have to cross Mount Vernon Road and that can be quite hair-raising Found a place to park courtesy of a friend who lives at the nearby flats and paid her for her pitch The residents were very aggressive towards me I no longer used this station There is spare land next to the station Scotrail could buy that for parking Station and line has potential but needs support
